    • Constructor Detail

      • Time

        public Time()
        Functionality: Creates a Time object with defalut to current hour, minute, and second.

      • Time

        public Time(boolean isMilitary,
            int hour,
            int minute,
            int second)
        Parameters:
        isMilitary, - hour, minute, second Valid boolean and three ints. Validity of those determined by client Functionality: Creates a Time object whose variable values are set to the three passed in ints. Boolean determines military time

      • updateSeconds

        public void updateSeconds()
        Functionality: Updates the value for the variable "second". Takes into consideration that the numbers restart from 59 to 0.

      • updateSecondsTimer

        Functionality: updates minute for timer functionality

      • updateHours

        public void updateHours()
        Functionality: Updates the value for the variable "hour". Takes into consideration that the numbers restart from 12 to 1 for the 12 hour clock, and from 23 to 0 for the 24 hour clock.

      • updateHoursTimer

        public void updateHoursTimer()
        Functionality: updates hours for timer functionality
